Text: I have It ! i saw it in DD - 1 ( national ) when i was just 10 years of age ! it's a fabulous up !  but i saw it without rekha ! the main movie most probably a Kannada movie ! Anant Nag is brilliant with his acting ! there was no sub as i remembered, but i saw it with my mother & lots of fear ! i have the Hindi version ! all of you must watch this ! very good up brego ! thanks a zillion !
